ingredients.ingredient: 10 ounces extra sharp Cheddar cheese, shredded
1 (1 ounce) envelope dry onion soup mix

cookingTips: Mix all ingredients until well combined, then chill before rolling in walnuts
Form into a ball and refrigerate for at least 2 hours for easier handling
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the cook combine soft cheeses with soup mix and shape into a walnut-coated ball for parties.
